Documentation Updates

Below are documentation updates for October-December 2022.

Index of all documentation updates

16-December-2022

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Brightcove Player 7 Migration Guide
  • Description: Changed upgrade steps from using JSON editor to using upgrade button in Studio
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/references/bcp7-migration-guide.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Step-by-Step: Simple TV Video App using Swift
  • Description: Updated images and tested code for latest version of Xcode
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/tvos/basics/step-step-simple-tv-video-app-using-swift.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Salesforce (eCommerce Connector)
  • Description: Added note that this connector is now free for all Marketing Studio customers
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/salesforce/index.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Adobe Magento (eCommerce Connector)
  • Description: Added note that this connector is now free for all Marketing Studio customers
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/adobe-magento-commerce/index.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Viewing Channel Output and Analytics
  • Description: Added better explanation of dropped frames and the live input status icon
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/viewing-channel-output-and-analytics.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Implementing Cue Points Programmatically
  • Description: Updated code in the HTML5 standard cue points section so code works with Safari and iOS
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/implementing-cue-points-programmatically.html#HTML5_standard_cue_points
  • Category:

Minor updates

  • Title: Chromecast Plugin for Brightcove Player
  • Description: Chromecast Device Support Update
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/chromecast-plugin-brightcove-player.html#Supported_Chromecast_devices
  • Category:
  • Title: Chromecast with the Native SDKs
  • Description: Chromecast Device Support Update
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/chromecast-with-sdks.html#Supported_Chromecast_devices
  • Category:
  • Title: Google Tag Manager Plugin for Brightcove Player
  • Description: Updated introduction and installation steps
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/google-tag-manager-plugin-brightcove-player.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Receiving In-App Purchase Notifications
  • Description: In the JSON payload specifications table added note on how Apple views renewals differently than other platforms
  • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/monetization/general/receive-iap-notifications.html#API_endpoint_specifications
  • Category:
  • Title: Using Multiple Languages
  • Description: Updated languages in the Choose the languages for your apps section
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/general/references/using-multiple-languages.html#Choose_the_languages_for_your_apps
  • Category:

9-December-2022

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Managing Slates
  • Description: Added notes clarifying that Cloud Playout slates are used only for Hard Starts and to fill live event time when there is no live input stream, and are not used to fill unused ad slot time (that is a different slate configured via Live SSAI setting.)
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/managing-slates.html
  • Category:

Minor updates

  • Title: Managing Text Tracks Using the CMS API
  • Description: Added notes clarifying that the default flag is treated the same for remote and ingested text tracks and that only one file can be set as default per language
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-text-tracks.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Kollective eCDN Deployment Guide
  • Description: Added note on TTL expiration for videos and how it can be changed
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecdn/kollective/kollective-deployment-guide.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Brightcove Live: Best Practices
  • Description: Input restrictions updated
  • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/get-started/live-module-guidelines-and-best-practices.html
  • Category:
